group.label: Capture settings
group.comment: You can configure to capture payments automatically, manually, with a capture delay, or upon shipment. The capture settings you configure here must match your capture settings in the Adyen Customer Area.

field.label: Capture delay
field.tooltip: Set to Immediate (default) to automatically capture funds immediately after authorization. Set to Manual if you want to capture funds later. This setting affects cards and alternative payment methods, but not open invoice payment methods.

field.label: Capture for open invoice payment methods
field.tooltip: Applicable for Klarna, Afterpay Touch, Ratepay, FacilyPay/Oney, Affirm, Clearpay, Zip and PayBright. Open invoice methods are set to manual capture by default. To use automatic capture, contact our support team. If you want to capture after goods are shipped, select On shipment.

field.label: Enable manual capture for PayPal
field.tooltip: If you requested our support team to enable manual capture for PayPal for your account, set to Yes. Default is No.

field.label: SEPA capture flow
field.tooltip: Sale is the default setting where SEPA payments are automatically captured. If you set this to Auth/Cap, the plugin uses the capture delay you set in the Adyen Customer Area.
